item.description:
What happens when you mix a Bar Crawl, a Booze Cruise and Pirates?

You get the Crawl In Boston Pirate Crawl. One of the stops will take us onto a boat for a scenic trip of the Boston Harbor. There are 3 decks in total, 2 fully enclosed, and an open-air upper deck. There will also be 2 full service bars, a lounge and dance areas including a professional sound system.

Before the ship, we?ll be navigating around Boston to the best bars the city has to offer. More info at crawlinboston.com/pirate
item.name: Pirate Crawl
